name: The Last Crusade
description:
This is an entry to ThanksJamming, a game jam for Georgia Game Developers' Association.

After the great war at the end of days, the Lord almighty sends you, a humble servant, and your friend, a humble priest on a holy crusade to wipe out the remnants of a demon stronghold. Using your sword of the spirit, and the healing words of your priest's holy Bible, hack and slash your way through six floors of demons! DEUS VULT!
